A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointing whether compared to its predecessor or not\, The Last Jedi fails to carry on the momentous story that The Force Awakens started. By wasting its runtime on anything but character development\, focusing the entire plot on a minor conflict in a major war\, and lacking emotional depth\, Johnson clearly wasn't the right person to pick up where Abrams left off. The Last Jedi may be a blockbuster but it's a let down to all Star Wars fans.
